channel.title: Comments on: Top 5 Sci-Fi & Fantasy Tropes
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: I like these, I hadn't really thought about them really. I'll have to think if I can come up with some other tropes.
item.content:encoded: I like these, I hadn’t really thought about them really. I’ll have to think if I can come up with some other tropes.

item.title: By: Tianna (@DragonTianna)
item.dc:creator: Tianna (@DragonTianna)
item.description: I agree with a lot of these, but I also love Obfuscating Stupidity, also known as the Columbo. The character pretends to be stupid and incompetent so that those around them lower their guard, but reveal they are actually the most badass in the show.
item.content:encoded: I agree with a lot of these, but I also love Obfuscating Stupidity, also known as the Columbo. The character pretends to be stupid and incompetent so that those around them lower their guard, but reveal they are actually the most badass in the show.
